name: Wing It!
description:
On the last stretch of an experimental direct flight from New York to Australia, the pilot and co-pilot collapse from exhaustion and cannot wake up. Having just raised your hand when the stewardess called for a trained pilot to help, you realize that you don't actually know how to fly a plane! 

Lucky for you, Conrad and Hermes Inc. has written a crash course guide on how to fly a plane in the event of an emergency. Manual in hand, you have to learn how to fly the plane or die trying.

(Made in 48hs for the GMTK Game Jam 2020)

NueSB: Lead Programmer

Dweebnut: Lead Composer
